overarchingElements.name: Artistic Goals
overarchingElements.description: High-level intentions behind the artwork (e.g., emotional impact, narrative purpose, thematic focus).
overarchingElements.example: To evoke a sense of nostalgia through urban isolation.

overarchingElements.name: Style
overarchingElements.description: Visual aesthetics or approach chosen by the artist (e.g., abstract expressionism, realism, surrealism).

overarchingElements.name: Themes and Symbolism
overarchingElements.description: Central ideas, symbols, or metaphors explored in the artwork.

overarchingElements.name: Medium
overarchingElements.description: The tools, materials, and methods used for physical creation (e.g., digital painting, oil on canvas, charcoal).
overarchingElements.example: Oil paint with a palette knife technique.

overarchingElements.name: Tools and Techniques
overarchingElements.description: Specific tools and methods the artist employs within their chosen medium.
overarchingElements.example: Using muted palettes to convey mood.

overarchingElements.name: Composition
overarchingElements.description: Layout and arrangement of visual elements within the piece (e.g., focal points, balance, perspective).
overarchingElements.example: Off-center composition to create visual tension.

overarchingElements.name: Inspirations and References
overarchingElements.description: External or internal influences driving the artist’s vision (e.g., historical references, nature, personal experiences).
overarchingElements.example: Inspired by Jackson Pollock’s use of color and texture.

overarchingElements.name: Emotions and Expression
overarchingElements.description: Emotional tones or expressions conveyed through the artwork (e.g., joy, rebellion, melancholy).
overarchingElements.example: Capturing the feeling of quiet loneliness.

overarchingElements.name: Other
overarchingElements.description: For any element which doesn't fit into any other description
overarchingElements.example: Unrelated artistic concepts or materials that defy categorization
